content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. Moving in a clockwise direction from the chimpanzee, the elements on the path are a teddy bear, a printer, a snoek, a Granny Smith, an isopod, a stove, a jeep, a minibus, a stethoscope, a great white shark, a warthog, an oboe, a bolete, a fire salamander, a bee, a barrette, a jay, a ski mask, and a monarch butterfly. What will you find?

Based on your description, I understand that you are currently located on the dot of the circular map with the ski mask and moving around the circle. If you move in a clockwise direction by 13 steps and then counter-clockwise by 5 steps, you will reach a stop, and from there you will encounter an item named "bee". If you continue to move clockwise by 10 steps and then counter-clockwise by 13 steps, you will come across an item named "barrette". If you then continue moving clockwise by 5 steps and move back in a counter-clockwise direction by 3 steps, you will come across a "monarch butterfly".
